channel.title: The Hodljuice Daily Pint
channel.itunes:author: curated by Hodljuice
channel.description: Daily collection of various Bitcoin-related podcasts

item.title: Australian Bitcoin Podcast: An Epic Year in Bitcoin: 2024 Recap
item.itunes:author: Australian Bitcoin Podcast
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin regulations, Bitcoin meet-ups, Bitcoin ecosystem reflections
item.description: Daniel and Alex recap significant milestones in the Bitcoin landscape for 2024, discussing Australian regulatory developments and silent payments. They reflect on Miniscript and highlight planned Bitcoin meet-ups for 2025. The episode covers various other topics related to the Bitcoin ecosystem as well.

item.title: Bitcoin Markets: Bitcoin Round Up - MSTR, IMF and El Salvador, China Stimulus, Price and more
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin Markets
item.itunes:keywords: Macroeconomic influences, Bitcoin price trends, Bitcoin initiatives in El Salvador
item.description: The hosts discuss various macroeconomic factors affecting Bitcoin and cryptocurrency markets, including MicroStrategy's activities and the IMF's stance on digital currencies. They delve into El Salvador's Bitcoin initiatives and China's economic stimulus measures while providing insights into current price trends.

item.title: Bitcoin and Markets: Bitcoin Round Up - MSTR, IMF and El Salvador, China Stimulus, Price and more - E428
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin and Markets
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin market analysis, geopolitical influences, MicroStrategy updates
item.description: This episode analyzes macroeconomic themes influencing Bitcoin, focusing on MicroStrategy's recent activities and the IMF's position on cryptocurrencies. The hosts also discuss developments in El Salvador's Bitcoin adoption and China's economic stimulus measures, stressing the correlation between price movements and global economic events.

item.title: Bitcoin for Millennials: Saving In BITCOIN Reshaped My Family's Future | Gus Boldrini | BFM116
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin for Millennials
item.itunes:keywords: Personal Bitcoin journey, monetary manipulation, Bitcoin's societal impact
item.description: Gus Boldrini shares his journey to discovering Bitcoin and explores the manipulation of money, viewing Bitcoin as a tool for truth and freedom. He discusses the significance of energy in value and reflects on Bitcoin's potential in shaping a better future, emphasizing curiosity as key to understanding it.

item.title: Bitcoin for PEACE: Fear vs Faith vs Future with Jeff Booth
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin for PEACE
item.itunes:keywords: Community connection, personal growth, societal challenges
item.description: Jeff Booth discusses the importance of love, belonging, and authenticity in confronting an extractive societal system. He encourages listeners to navigate fear and embrace their true selves through Bitcoin, emphasizing relationships as core to success while addressing imposter syndrome.

item.title: Coin Stories: Jeff Booth: A Masterclass on Price of Tomorrow, Inflation, Deflation & Bitcoin
item.itunes:author: Coin Stories
item.itunes:keywords: Economic shifts, inflation vs. deflation, Bitcoin's future
item.description: Jeff Booth delves into inflation and deflation, arguing that inflation represents a significant deception in the financial world. He discusses the imminent end of the fiat system and the transition toward a Bitcoin-centric economy, providing critical insights into these economic transformations.

item.title: Fractal Bitcoin: Personal Updates - Ep.246
item.itunes:author: Fractal Bitcoin
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin market updates, community reflections, cultural impacts
item.description: This episode offers quick updates on the Bitcoin market, noting a brief dip in price followed by a rebound. It reflects on a notable interview about Hal Finney and the Running Bitcoin Challenge while encouraging listeners to stay connected for daily Bitcoin news.

item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin's value prospects, educational tools, market predictions
